item.title: New governance tools for hybrid access and identity verification
item.description: Identity governance is undergoing changes. As work occurs across cloud applications, remote settings, and on-premises systems, it becomes increasingly important to track and manage access. Organizations require effective controls to oversee access, minimize manual tasks, and fulfill compliance requirements while maintaining necessary business systems. To help organizations easily migrate to the cloud for enhanced security controls and improve security, we’re excited to announce the public preview of two new capabilities that further modernize identity governance and address critical challenges...
